mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum as rnum, nr.cl_review_no as classReviewNo, nr.cl_no as classNo, (select cl_name from noel_CLASS nc where nc.cl_no = nr.cl_no) as className, nr.marketer_id as marketerId, nr.user_id as userId, nr.cl_review_content as classReviewContent, nr.cl_review_regdate as classReviewRegdate, nr.cl_review_name as classReviewName, ( SELECT img_path FROM noel_review_img ri WHERE ri.cl_review_no = nr.cl_review_no ) AS thumnail FROM noel_class_review nr ORDER BY classReviewNo ASC) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select max (cl_review_no) as classReview_No from noel_class_review

select cl_review_no as classReviewNo, cl_no as classNo, cl_name as className, marketer_id as marketerId, user_id as userId, cl_review_content as classReviewContent, cl_review_regdate as classReviewRegdate, cl_review_name as classReviewName, (select img_path from noel_review_img ri where ri.cl_review_no = nr.cl_review_no) as thumNail from noel_class_review nr where nr.cl_review_no = #{_parameter}
select cl_review_num as classReviewNum, cl_review_no as classReviewNo, img_path as imgPath from noel_review_img where cl_review_no = #{classReviewNo}

select cl_review_no as classReviewNo, cl_no as classNo, cl_name as className, marketer_id as marketerId, user_id as userId, cl_review_content as classReviewContent, cl_review_regdate as classReviewRegdate, cl_review_name as classReviewName from noel_class_review where cl_review_no =#{classReviewNo}
mapper.update: update noel_class_review set cl_no = #{classNo}, cl_name = #{className}, marketer_id = #{marketerId}, user_id = #{userId}, cl_review_content = #{classReviewContent}, cl_review_regdate = #{classReviewRegdate}, cl_review_name = #{classReviewName} where cl_review_no = #{classReviewNo}
